channel.title: Posts on Geoff on Software
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Geoff on Software

item.title: Terminal/Intellij VCS Conflict
item.description: Intellij creates a file .idea/vcs.xml to track what it’s doing with VCS. This creates a conflict if you manage VCS via command line as well.

item.title: How To Learn Kotlin
item.description: Kotlin is still new, so there isn’t the body of tutorials available compared to established languages like Java or Python.

item.title: Knowledge Work Context Switching
item.description: Table of Contents Motivation Questions Raised Persever or Switch Context Switching Strategies Measuring Strategy effectiveness Conclusion Motivation I’m on Leetcode, a technical software interview practice site.

item.title: SelfieLog
item.description: New app idea Problem switching contexts between workout focus and data collection breaks flow Solution separate these two concerns. Track physical progress through post-workout mirror selfies.
